targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  title 
FROM category 
WHERE id=$categoryId

SELECT 
  id AS "ID", 
  title AS "Title" ,
  assignable AS "Assignable",
  etag AS "eTag"
FROM category 
WHERE id=$categoryId

SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT "channelId") AS "Channels" 
FROM video 
WHERE video."categoryId"='$categoryId'

SELECT 
  SUM("videosPublished") AS "Videos"
FROM video_summary
WHERE "categoryId"='$categoryId'

SELECT 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt") AS "Year",
  COUNT(*) AS "Videos Published"
FROM video
WHERE "categoryId"='$categoryId'
GROUP BY "Year"
ORDER BY "Year"  DESC

SELECT 
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views",
  SUM(likes) AS "Likes",
  SUM(dislikes) AS "Dislikes",
  SUM("commentCount") AS "Comments"
FROM video_summary
WHERE "categoryId" = '$categoryId'

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2020"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2020
  AND video."categoryId"='$categoryId'
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2021"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2021
  AND video."categoryId"='$categoryId'
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2022"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2022
  AND video."categoryId"='$categoryId'
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "Day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views 2023"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = 2023
  AND video."categoryId"='$categoryId'
GROUP BY "Day"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Views Per Day Of The Week

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  channel.title AS "Channel",
  COUNT(*) AS "Videos Published"
FROM video, channel
WHERE 
  "categoryId"=$categoryId 
  AND "channelId"=channel.id
GROUP BY "Channel"
ORDER BY "Videos Published"  DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  "day" AS "Best Day For Views",
  AVG("ViewCount") AS "Total Views"
FROM (
SELECT
  "dowPublished" AS "day",
  SUM("viewCount") AS "ViewCount"
FROM video
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "publishedAt" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') IN (2020,2021,2022,2023)
  AND video."categoryId"='$categoryId'
GROUP BY "day"
ORDER BY 1
) AS perDOWperYear
GROUP BY "day"
ORDER BY "Total Views" DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Best Day Of The Week For Views

targets.rawSql:
WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category",
      MAX("viewCount") AS "Views"
    FROM
      video
    WHERE "categoryId"='$categoryId'
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX("viewCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Views"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Views" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      MAX(likes) AS "Likes",
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category"
    FROM
      video
    WHERE "categoryId"='$categoryId'
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX(likes) DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Likes"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Likes" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      MAX(dislikes) AS "Dislikes",
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category"
    FROM
      video
    WHERE "categoryId"='$categoryId'
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX(dislikes) DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Dislikes"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Dislikes" DESC

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category",
      MAX("commentCount") AS "Comments"
    FROM
      video
    WHERE "categoryId"='$categoryId'
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX("commentCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Comments"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Comments" DESC

SELECT 
  $year AS "Year"

SELECT 
  SUM("videosPublished") AS "Videos Published"
FROM video_summary
WHERE 
  year = $year 
  AND "categoryId"='$categoryId' 
GROUP BY "year"

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
FROM trend
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
  AND "categoryId"='$categoryId'

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      "channelId",
      COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
    FROM trend
    WHERE 
      "categoryId"='$categoryId' 
      AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
    GROUP BY "channelId"
    ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
SELECT 
  channel.title AS "Channel",
  most."Trends"
FROM 
  channel, most
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId"
ORDER BY "Trends" DESC

SELECT
  "regionId",
  COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
FROM trend
WHERE 
  "categoryId"='$categoryId' 
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
GROUP BY "regionId"
ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      "videoId",
      COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
    FROM trend
    WHERE 
      "categoryId"='$categoryId' 
      AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
    GROUP BY "videoId"
    ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
SELECT 
  video.title AS "Video",
  most."Trends"
FROM 
  video, most
WHERE 
  video.id = most."videoId"
ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
